div.span: Monroe Central School Corporation Announcement - Friday, April 3, 2020 #mcscbears https://t.co/KmcmEJNbyf via @YouTube
Monroe Central Announcement - Friday, April 3, 2020 #mcscbears https://t.co/QY5om5tQQ5
Indiana schools will be closed to in person classes for the reminder of the 2019-20 academic year - more details to come on our virtual learning plan #mcscbears

br.em: The Mission of the Monroe Central School Community is to Engage and Empower All Students to Excel in Being Productive and Responsible Citizens.

div.p:
MONROE CENTRAL
SCHOOL CORPORATION
1918 N 1000 W
Parker City, IN 47368-9571
(765) 468-6868
(765) 468-6578 fax

ELEMENTARY SCHOOL
